mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_EMPLOYEE
order by ${orderByClause}
select ee.* from t_employee ee join t_job_user ju on ju.emp_id = ee.id where ju.job_id=#{jid}
mapper.insert:
select seq_employee_id.nextval from dual
